com.cyberneid.disigon.sdk

Class SignatureVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyberneid.disigon.sdk.SignatureVerifier

  • public class SignatureVerifier
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for signature verification in the format CAdES and PAdES
    Author:
    ugos
